level.heading: Proceedings governed by other law.
level.text: This chapter does not govern a proceeding pertaining to:
The authorization of emergency medical care for a child;
An adoption proceeding pursuant to § 16-301; or
A proceeding to adjudicate the parentage of a child pursuant to § 16-909(b-2).

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-233 rewrote the section.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-293
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-293, see notes following § 16-4601.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-233
level.text: Law 19-233, the "Judicial Declaration of Parentage Amendment Act of 2011," was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-615. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Oct. 16, 2012, and Nov. 2, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Nov. 20, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-550 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-233 became effective on Mar. 19, 2013.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 103 of the Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction and Enforcement Act (1997 Act).
